author: adrianc
msg: Visual Themes framework - for more information see https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-1885.
This commit provides a means to swap out the current UI theme for another one. Alternate style sheets, templates, JavScript files, etc can be used to give OFBiz a completely different look.
Right now the plan is to have "theme libraries" that can be dropped in the hot-deploy folder. Work still needs to be done to connect web stores and product catalogs to the visual theme framework.
Users can select their preferred theme in the back-office applications.
